Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 27, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Two Russian artists collaborate to create six ambient drones. I wish it were as simple as that, so I'll refrain from further comment and let the sound conjure my wishes. EPHEMERAL
